AboutMe.title: Who Am I?
AboutMe.content: Hi, my name is Tomasz Jelito and I am a full-stack web developer from Poland. I started my digital journey at the age of 12, learning the basics of programming and web design on my own. I'm currently in my 5th year of Computer Science technical school, developing my dream career of a freelancer. I never stop learning and follow technology trends to stay on top of what I do.
